items.sentence: I think we\'ll all feel better once we get a little sleep.
I think we\'ve got enough money to buy everything we need.
Tom didn\'t know he shouldn\'t be doing what he was doing.
Tom\'s doctor advised him to cut down on his sugar intake.
Tom\'s hair has turned gray since the last time I saw him.
It was hard for Tom to tell Mary that he wanted a divorce.
I\'d be more than happy to help you clean out your garage.
I\'ve only met Mary once, but she seemed like a nice girl.
Tom made more money on that deal than he thought he would.
I think you and Tom are more alike than you want to admit.
I asked the waiter to see about getting us a better table.
We would still be open if we had anything to left to sell.
Do you know how many years Tom and Mary have been married?
I think we need to encourage Tom to study a little harder.
Tom ran as fast as he could to escape from the angry bear.
Tom reached for the last donut, but Mary grabbed it first.
Tom read the French translation and thought it sounded OK.
Tom realized there was no way he could do that by himself.
In many places it isn\'t legal to walk a dog on the beach.
My parents are away on a trip and I\'m alone in our house.
Tom and Mary dated for about three months three years ago.
Tom wanted to call the police, but Mary wouldn\'t let him.
Have you ever considered getting rid of some of this junk?
Have you ever seen Tom and Mary in the same room together?
I could only answer three of the questions that Tom asked.
I\'ve heard that Tom Jackson is the best lawyer in Boston.
Don\'t waste your time trying to convince Tom to help you.
Don\'t you remember that week we spent together in Boston?
Don\'t you want to know how Tom learned French so quickly?
Even though Tom is on the team, he\'s just a bench warmer.
I have a friend whose father is the captain of a big ship.
Tom doesn\'t seem to think he needs to go to the hospital.
Tom didn\'t think he\'d ever get used to living in Boston.
How did you know that Tom was going to be able to do that?
Tom has no intention of asking Mary to the upcoming dance.
Mary isn\'t so beautiful, but she has a great personality.
I want the two of you to try to get along with each other.
I want to know if you can go fishing with us next weekend.
Tom might\'ve been able to tell us what we wanted to know.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me he needed to do that.
Tom says that recently he isn\'t able to get enough sleep.
Recently, Tom has been hanging out with Mary all the time.
I can\'t seem to do anything that doesn\'t make Tom angry.
Tom told me that he needed to get something off his chest.
I check off each task on my list as soon as I complete it.
I know a lot of people who don\'t have driver\'s licenses.
The books that I bought were delivered to me this morning.
The cookies Tom baked this afternoon are really delicious.
The detective promised to look into the matter right away.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to talk to Tom about that?
